name: PBS Processor Microcode
description: 处理器微码是在处理器上运行的底层软件层,为其固件提供补丁或更新。微码更新可以修复硬件错误、提高性能并增强处理器的安全功能。此脚本适用于 Proxmox Backup Server 环境,仅在裸机系统上运行。如果在虚拟化环境中运行,脚本将退出。请注意,固件更新机制(如 Intel 的 Management Engine (ME) 或 AMD 的 Platform Security Processor (PSP))可能因您的处理器及其实现而异。请查阅处理器文档以验证是否可以通过操作系统应用固件更新。

notes.text: Execute within the Proxmox Backup Server shell on a bare metal system. The script will exit if it detects that it is running in a virtualized environment.
After a reboot, you can check whether any microcode updates are currently in effect by running the following command: `journalctl -k | grep -E "microcode" | head -n 1`
